summary: An Ordinance refunding excess portions of all assessments levied for the improvement of alley Block 17, A. A. Denny's Addition, under Ordinance No. 14241, creating Local Improvement District No. 1301 to the payors thereof, directing the City Treasurer to prepare a detail list of said payors of assessment, authorizing the drawing of warrants and appropriating money out of the said Local Improvement Fund for said purpose.
